__e: - I used to know people like you, people who thought they were better than me.
These guys thought they were the most important guys in the world... with the most important jobs in the world.
Who all thought they were first in line.
Who all thought they were first in line.
You created an opportunity many of us thought we'd never have again.
These guys thought they were the most important guys in the world... with the most important jobs in the world.
Even when he was a creature, cursed to the point of no return, when everyone believed he was beyond saving, you fought for him.
And thousands of years before that, during the Long Night, we can forgive them for thinking it truly was the end.
Whole town thought he did it when she disappeared, but I never did.
They didn't think their daughter was coming. Now she is.
Your parents thought that your career would be impossible, and the doctors said that your pregnancy would be impossible, and now you think that managing it all is impossible.
Because everyone thought his death was an accident.
And the Mayans believed that this contact with the gods, this contact with the sky, happened there, up until the most recent of times.
To save a bunch of people who didn't believe you, who didn't see what you had seen coming?
And thousands of years before that, during the Long Night, we can forgive them for thinking it truly was the end.
